title: Oswald, the many-headed medieval saint
itunes:title: Oswald, the many-headed medieval saint
itunes:subtitle: Dr Johanna Dale explores how the seventh-century Northumbrian king Oswald became an important saint across medieval Europe.
description:
Dr Johanna Dale explores how the seventh-century Northumbrian king Oswald become an important and popular saint across medieval Europe, and explains what his story can tell us about religion in the Middle Ages.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
